name: The Sims: Superstar
description:
The Sims: Superstar is a strategy game developed by Maxis. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Electronic Arts. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
The Sims: Superstar is available on PC.
It was scored by Dix Bruce, Jerry Martin, Kirk R. Casey and Marc Russo.
